values: 法官；审判官；裁判员；评委；鉴定人；评判员；仲裁人；裁决者；（以色列历史上的）士师
判断；评判；裁定；审判；裁判；评价；决定；评估；仲裁；对（竞赛）作评审；担任裁判；（法官）宣判；裁决；判决

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 公正的，明断的；法庭的；审判上的
应受审判的；可被审判的
意见；判断力；[法] 审判；评价
判断；裁判；判决书；辨别力
法官的职权；法官的地位
司法；法官；司法权；法官的职位

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。
指从听到的情况推测、判定。
指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
指有充分根据的推论，也指逻辑学上的演绎。
法律用词，指审判后判定有罪，但未作最后判决。
指对案件作出审理判决，但判决内容较笼统，不如sentence和condemn使用广泛。
法律用词，指根据罪犯所犯罪行的轻重而宣判处罚。
书面用词，指郑重他宣判某人有罪。
普通用词，指法院对审理结束的案件做出的定罪判刑。

word_group.brief_definition: 勿以貌取人；勿只凭外表判断
word_group.phrase: don't judge a book by its cover

word_group.brief_definition: 人不可貌相；海水不可斗量
word_group.phrase: you can't judge a book by its cover

word_group.brief_definition: 主审法官；审判长；主持法官
移民法官；移民局长官；移民事务法官
离异案件的法官；离婚法官；办理离婚的法官

bilingual.source: The Prophet Mohammed informed us that Allah's curse is on the one who offers the bribe and on the judge who accepts it.
bilingual.target: 先知穆罕默德告诉我们，真主的诅咒会降临在行贿者和接受贿赂的法官身上。

bilingual.source: The judge sentenced him to be hanged.

list.abstract: judge，英文单词。译作：审判；评判，也可以译作法官；裁判员。

yingyinNormal.en: OK. I'm gonna go talk to the judge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，我去跟法官谈谈

yingyinNormal.en: A judge will probably knock this down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官会驳回此案吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You both can take this up with the judge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们到法官面前去争吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're a judge, a doctor and a racing expert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来你不只是法官，还是个赛车高手

yingyinNormal.en: After you were told this, you met with Judge Kluger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们告诉你后，你去见了克卢格法官。

yingyinNormal.en: Not important, Your Honor. She's... The judge is not allowing her...
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是重要，法官阁下，她是... 法官不让她...

yingyinNormal.en: He punched a judge? Yep. Why? I guess he didn't like his decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他打了个法官？没错。为什么呢？我想是他对法官的判决不满吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And we'll need you and Rachel to testify before a judge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和瑞秋得向法官说明。

yingyinNormal.en: The judge is having us sequestered until we reach a verdict.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官要求我们做出一致裁决前必须与世隔绝。

yingyinNormal.en: He was disbarred for a criminal conviction. He punched a judge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他因为刑事犯罪被吊销了执照，他打了个法官。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm gonna call New Jersey. See if I can talk to the judge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我会打去新泽西州问问看，看能不能跟那个法官聊一聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Delaney? The judge won't allow any mention of him. Do we think he did it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 德兰尼教授？法官不允许提到他。我们认为是他干的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It would've made me judge, jury and executioner with zero accountability.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这项目让我集法官，陪审，执行者这三种角色于一身，并且责任全免。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a sting. Of who, me? No. Then let me go to the judge and brief him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个圈套。给谁下的？我吗？不是。那就让我去找法官，向他说明情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, the judge gave me a choice, either two years in prison or hormonal therapy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃，法官给我一个选择，呃，要么在监狱坐两年牢，要么激素治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you want to get the judge on the line? What, and delay this even more? Go ahead, Eddie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想连线法官吗? 干嘛?让你们拖延更久吗? 继续，艾迪。

yingyinNormal.en: Because you punched a judge after he found a client of yours guilty. Objection. Relevance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 理由是你动手打法官，因他判你当事人有罪。反对，与本案无关。

yingyinNormal.en: David, both our clients have been bloodied here, and there's no way to predict which way the judge will go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫，我们双方的当事人都付出代价了，我们无法预测法官会怎么判。

yingyinNormal.en: I never told you to lie. In fact, I explicitly told you not to lie. Let's let the judge decide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可没让你去撒谎，事实上，我还很明确地告诉你不能撒谎。那让法官来做判断吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. So this is what's going to happen: I'm going to the judge and I'm going to ask to be relieved as your attorney.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那好，接下事情会这样，我会去找法官跟他说我不再是你的律师了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 评判的；评审的；裁决的；挑剔的
n. 判断；上天的惩罚；报应；判决；审判；结论；裁决；意见；看法
adj. 司法的；法院的；法官的；公正的；明断的
n. 判断；上天的惩罚；报应（同JUDGEMENT）

word_family.mean: n. 法官；审判员；鉴定人；行家；鉴赏家；裁判员；评判员；士师

sense_info_list.en: a public officer appointed to decide cases in a law court

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>judge</highlight> has now overruled the city's decision to stop levying fines, ordering them reinstated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名法官现在驳回了该市停止征收罚款的决定，命令恢复罚款。

examination_example.sentence: In 2010, a federal <highlight>judge</highlight> shook America's biotech industry to its core.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2010年，一名联邦法官彻底撼动了美国的生物技术产业。

examination_example.sentence: But in March 2010 a <highlight>judge</highlight> ruled that genes were unpatentable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在2010年3月，一名法官裁定基因不可专利。

sense_info_list.en: form an opinion or conclusion about

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>judged</highlight> whether they were strangers, friends, or dating partners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她判断他们是陌生人、朋友还是约会对象。

examination_example.sentence: We fear we'll be <highlight>judged</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们害怕自己会被品头论足。

examination_example.sentence: It takes a while to <highlight>judge</highlight> complex aspects of personality, like neuroticism or open-mindedness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 判断性格的复杂方面需要一段时间，比如神经质或思想开放。

examination_example.sentence: Invite him to be a <highlight>judge</highlight> for the upcoming English speech contest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 邀请他担任即将到来的英语演讲比赛的评委。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 判断；上天的惩罚；报应；判决；审判；结论；裁决；意见；看法
adj. 判断的；审判的；吹毛求疵的
v. 对…判断不公；错怪；错误判断
n. 判断；上天的惩罚；报应（同JUDGEMENT）

word_family.mean: n. 法官；审判员；鉴定人；行家；鉴赏家；裁判员；评判员；士师

sense_info_list.en: form an opinion or conclusion about

examination_example.sentence: However, they are sometimes unable to recognize false information on the Internet, <highlight>judge</highlight> the reliability of online information sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，他们有时无法识别互联网上的虚假信息，无法判断在线信息来源的可靠性。

examination_example.sentence: With a book, the conversation takes place inside someone's head and without the risk of being <highlight>judged</highlight> by others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有了书，对话就发生在某人的脑海里，没有被他人评判的风险。

examination_example.sentence: It's telling that, while Google began life as a PhD thesis, Facebook started as a tool to <highlight>judge</highlight> classmates' appearances.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很明显，当谷歌以一篇博士论文的形式诞生时，脸书却是作为一个评判同学外貌的工具而诞生的。

sense_info_list.en: a public officer appointed to decide cases in a law court
decide (a case) in court; give a verdict on (someone) in court
express a bad opinion of one's behavior, often because you think you are better than them

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
指有充分根据的推论, 也指逻辑学上的演绎。
指从听到的情况推测、判定。
指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。
普通用词, 指法院对审理结束的案件做出的定罪判刑。
法律用词, 指审判后判定有罪, 但未作最后判决。
指对案件作出审理判决, 但判决内容较笼统, 不如 sentence 和 condemn 使用广泛。

examination_example.sentence: We're not here to <highlight>judge</highlight> them because on any given day, that could be me or you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不是来评判他们的因为在任何一天，那都可能是我或你。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, it is of great importance to have a panel from the ESL (English as Second Language) faculty as <highlight>judges</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，有一个来自ESL(英语作为第二语言)学院的小组作为评委是非常重要的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 判断；上天的惩罚；报应；判决；审判；结论；裁决；意见；看法

word_family.mean: n. 法官；审判员；鉴定人；行家；鉴赏家；裁判员；评判员；士师

sense_info_list.en: form an opinion or conclusion about

examination_example.sentence: Don't <highlight>judge</highlight> people by their looks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要以貌取人。

examination_example.sentence: He might not <highlight>judge</highlight> things correctly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他可能无法正确判断事物。

examination_example.sentence: Before you begin speaking, you will be <highlight>judged</highlight> on your body language.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你开始说话之前，你会被你的肢体语言评判。

examination_example.sentence: The man said to the <highlight>judge</highlight>: They were just stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那人对法官说：他们只是故事。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>judge</highlight> said to the man: "Write all the things you said about him on a piece of paper."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法官对那个人说：“把你所说的关于他的所有事情都写在一张纸上。”

examination_example.sentence: From the material, we can see that the <highlight>judge</highlight> is wise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从材料中，我们可以看出法官是明智的。

examination_example.sentence: By the way, can you ask Mr. White to be our <highlight>judge</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对了，你能请怀特先生做我们的评委吗？
